name: df-linds

bodyPretty: ⊢ LIndS =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))|(= |` s1)[LIndF]s0 })
comment: An independent set is a set which is independent as a family. See also ~ islinds3 and ~ islinds4 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Feb-2015.)
